LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Leg_Normal.label: reinforced leg
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Leg_Normal.description: By strengthening the muscles and bones, we can create legs that allow for more weight capacity and speed.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Leg_Hand.label: grasping leg
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Leg_Hand.description: By imitating our genetic relatives, we can create a limb that functions as both a leg and an arm.
